# seqera_primary_compute_env (Resource)

PrimaryComputeEnv Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "seqera_primary_compute_env" "my_primarycomputeenv" {
  compute_env_id = "...my_compute_env_id..."
  workspace_id   = 0
}
```
